author: MSNBC
title: Detroit teen charged with murder in shooting deaths of 5-year-old boy, two other people
description: A 16-year-old accused of fatally shooting a 5-year-old boy, the boy's mother, and her boyfriend in their Detroit home has been charged with felony murder, the
content:
A 16-year-old accused of fatally shooting a 5-year-old boy, the boy's mother, and her boyfriend in their Detroit home has been charged with felony murder, the prosecutor's office announced.
